preqs: FIT1041 and one of FIT2083 or FIT2084

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {FIT1041} and  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT2083, FIT2084} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS})

description: This unit builds upon FIT1041 and FIT2083 or FIT2084 and allows students to conduct an independent research project. Students will be assigned to one of the Faculty of Information Technology's research groups, an academic supervisor and a research topic. Students may work on their project individually or in groups, as determined by their supervisor. During the semester, the student will be required to participate in research group events including seminars and presentations.
